head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths YOCHIM, LEO R.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths YOCHIM, LEO R.

block.p: YOCHIM--Leo R., 77, died suddenly Saturday April 7th, 2007. Owner of Printronic Corporation of America for 40 years retiring 1999. Born in Philadelphia, lived in New York City 25 years, Colts Neck ten years, and recently Manchester. Marine Tech Sergeant served 1948-1953. Member Direct Marketing Association, NY, NY. Trustee to Staten Island Botanical Garden, Thalia Mara Arts Foundation - Jackson MS, Long Island Symphony Orchestra and New York City Ice Theatre. Surviving-Lifemate Susan Ann Keenan, Sons Richard L., Carl J., Victor E., and Michael D., daughters Elaine T. Herter, Jean M. Almeida, Jane Hudak, Denise A. Ficara, Victoria F. Irving, and Susan Mallow, brothers, Louis and Victor, sisters Barbara Hatch, Marie Yetman, Loretta Thomas, and M. Patricia Yochim, 21 grandchildren and eight great-grandchildren. Visitation Friday 2-4 and 7-9 at Oliverie Funeral Home 2925 Ridgeway Rd., Manchester, NJ. Funeral Liturgy, Sat 10am, St. John's Church, Lakehurst with private cremation. For directions or to send online condolences please visit our website at www.oliveriefuneralhome.com
